    hnn_core.L5Pyr¶

    class hnn_core.L5Pyr(gid=-1, pos=-1, p={})¶

    Layer 5 Pyramidal class.

    Attributes
    namestr

    The name of the cell

    dendsdict

    The dendrites. The key is the name of the dendrite and the value is an instance of h.Section.

    list_dendlist of h.Section

    List of dendrites.
